title: "Phyloseq for Tirza"
author: "Beatrice Cornu Hewitt" 
date: "`r Sys.time()`"
---

```{r}
ps_complete <- readRDS("../Output/Phyloseq/2_ps_complete.Rds")
ps_GF <- subset_samples(ps_complete, !(population %in% c("CP", "GP")))

ps_GF_clean <- prune_taxa(taxa_sums(ps_GF) > 0, ps_GF)
ps_GF_clean; ps_GF
saveRDS(ps_GF_clean,"../Output/Phyloseq/ps_GF_cleaned.Rds" )
```
